website_summaries.verdict: Chic and durable, this designer citrus juicer is a solid choice for making smooth orange juice and lemonade.
pros: Automatic reamer does all of the work
Simple to dissemble and wash. Includes dust cover
cons: This citrus juicer is as pricy as it is stylish

customer_reviews.title: not so good for limes
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of limes--bought this because it was very cool looking. It dances across the counter because it sits on little legs--if the counter gets a little damp--the juicer is does not stay put. Also, it only has one size reamer that is really too big for small limes. It is now in a box in the closet and I am back to using my Epica-not nearly as attractive but it works faster and has a smaller reamer that works well for limes. I really thought this would be great--and it got good reviews. Did not work for me. 4 stars for esthetics though.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Vic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but dead
customer_reviews.text: Completely died just after a year from purchase. was working great, but stopped mid- juicing and now it's a nice looking paperweight. Had a cheap black and decker that has lasted over 5 years. Smeg, I wanted to love your smooth sexy lines but alas, quality time over beauty wins out.
customer_reviews.author: Peter r Shumar

customer_reviews.title: One star off for the plastic collection tray.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I dished out the cost of this product was to avoid plastic parts. The juicer has a stainless steel reamer, strainer, and spout but the collection tray is plastic. Such a shame for the company to skimp on this part! Hope the company/manufacturer addresses this in future models.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Parts
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a couple of times and the cheap plastic parts have already broken. I would recommend buying other juicers that are all stainless steel for only a little bit more money.
customer_reviews.author: Uomo Universale

customer_reviews.title: Humming through juicing...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and smooth running - easy to clean. Looks to be a solid keeper in all aspects of function, showing off its splendid design. The Smeg will be an essential, out on the counter. daily juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Maven

customer_reviews.title: Fab counter appeal!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute! It works, it looks like a little robot pet on my counter top. I love it! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works brilliantly.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS JUICER!!!! So cute and works so well! I only wish every small appliance had a retractable cord. If this juicer had that, it would be absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I used to love it...
customer_reviews.text: until the flap where the drink comes out broke...I have been using for only 5 months..I mean..a juicer that costs $169 which doesn't last more than a few months is a SHAME...im so disappointed with the product..shame on Smeg.
customer_reviews.author: Lis Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Love! love!
customer_reviews.text: I am so enjoying this juicer! Easy to clean! Love the color and retro style!
customer_reviews.author: SubDeb

customer_reviews.title: Smeg
customer_reviews.text: I love Smeg so I love this beautiful blue juicer
customer_reviews.author: Wianca

customer_reviews.title: The spout broke off of this juicer after 3 months of moderate use.
customer_reviews.text: The Smeg is a great juicer, but the spout broke off after 3 months of moderate use. We filed a warranty claim with Smeg, which promised to deliver a new bowl with spout attached. We were told the part was "back-ordered" 4 months ago, and are still waiting. The juicer is good, but the customer service is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Mickiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchased of Smeg. I love the color and the design. It's very trendy. The juice comes out perfectly. It's very easy to clean. The only thing is that it's too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: HOA BUI

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and trendy
customer_reviews.text: I use my juicer every day. This one is quieter than my older one. I like that it has a stainless steel “squeezer”and other parts as opposed to plastic. A good design and easy cleanup. I also like the color (green).
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. I thought it was regular juicer. It’s really cute though
customer_reviews.author: Jmb

customer_reviews.title: What not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy juicing God! Fresh grapefruit juice has never been easier and clean up is a breeze! Don’t put it away, looks amazing sitting on the counter!!
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I got the baby blue color and it works great and the design is very pleasing to look at! I juice all citrus with it..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon zacsek

customer_reviews.title: Gets every drop of juice from the fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Gets every last drop of juice out of fruit. We do lemons and oranges almost every day. Love it and happy I purchased it. Also it has a very cool retro look.
customer_reviews.author: TOB

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Awesome way to get your vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Awesome way to get your vitamin C!!
customer_reviews.author: Mari bailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: We love this juicer. Looks great on the counter and cleans up easily. Great for orange juice, lemons, limes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a bit pricey, but a fun splurge
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous design, sturdy construction - makes juicing citrus for recipes or drinks a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Schugart

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional citrus Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my Smeg juicer! So happy I decided to go with it. It looks beautiful in my kitchen. Easy to use and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: William Salgado

customer_reviews.title: It sqeezes very slow.
customer_reviews.text: I liked its beauty. Did not like the strength of squeezing. The engine is turning very slow. I returned the product to Amazon without using it.
customer_reviews.author: Eytan Gabay

customer_reviews.title: You pay for the looks, it just does whatever other Juicer does...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest the price only pays for the looks,
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power.
customer_reviews.text: Best Citrus juicier I have owned. The power cord is a little long to fit in the cable management lugs. Not really a big deal, but you would think for the price the power cord should fit in the cable management lugs. Disappointed it is made in China considering the price of $160.00.
customer_reviews.author: SCM

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working on the second use. Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and last Smeg product that I will purchase. On the second use, this juicer simply stopped working and would not restart. Now, I have 6 lbs of oranges, 2 lbs of limes, and no juicer. When it worked, it worked like a charm. Unfortunately, though, its utility was very short-lived.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Product works well  -plastic pieces are flimsy and surprising given the cost. Broke after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: The motor on this product seems powerful, but the juice tray and lid are made of light and flimsy plastic. It feels like it will crack sooner rather than later and for the cost of this product, I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Film buff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful juicer
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Product works great! Worked for oranges, lemons & limes. Easy to clean. I had to clean out the pulp tray half way through & my juice was not pulp free so I had to strain it when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: D. Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer, looks awesome on my counter top and is very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Produces mold
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for 6 months! Just discovered MOLD in a part that dispenses the juice and it cannot be cleaned! Can not access inside the part to clean out the mold! Shock. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B.

product_meta.title: Smeg Citrus Juicer
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:Pastel GreenSmog 50s retro style appliances will add a pop to any kitchen! With a die-cast aluminum powder coated body, universal stainless steel strainer, stainless steel reamer, anti-drip stainless steel spout, and chrome plated ring and inner bowl, the Smog Citrus Juicer is built to last and never go out of style!
feature_bullets: Triton cover to protect from dust when the product is not in use. Can be used as a bowl for fruit and peel.
Stainless steel and anti-corrosive components on the universal and premium reamer and strainer ensure complete squeezing from both small and large fruit.
The stainless steel, anti-drip spout dispenses the juice directly into the glass or cup. Lift up to interrupt the flow and prevent dripping.
Premium juicing bowl made in Triton : BPA-free, impact resistant, easy to remove.
Powerful 80W motor with built-in sensor; the juicing process starts once there's pressure on the reamer, for an easy and no-effort use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
